entry.title: Special Weather Statement issued June 13 at 1:40PM AKDT by NWS
entry.summary: ...High Water On The Koyukuk River This Week... Runoff from heavy rain in the Brooks Range late last week is moving down the Koyukuk River. entry.summary: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of southeastern Essex, western Addison and southwestern Chittenden Counties through 400 PM EDT... entry.title: Flood Watch issued June 14 at 1:13PM MDT until June 17 at 12:00PM MDT by NWS
entry.summary: .Moderate to heavy rain is likely to fall across portions of central and north-central WY from Thursday afternoon through Friday afternoon. Amounts over one inch are expected. This addition rainfall with combine with already saturated soils and continued snowmelt runoff to create additional flooding situations across the area.
